titles: Philippe and Marye by the grace of God, Kyng and Queene of England, Fraunce, Naples, Jerusalem, and Irelande ... Philippus & Maria Dei gratia, rex & regina, Angliæ, Franciæ, Neapolis, Ierusalem, & Hiberniæ ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.
publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Regiæ Maiestatis excusum,
notes: Announcing the style of the king and queen.
